name: Corrupted Commander
description:
I am a Solo developer and have made this game for anyone to enjoy, the game is still being developed and i thought it was time to let the community help me test and balance and have fun at the same time, i enjoy making games and will enjoy getting to battle some of you, with the community support i am hoping to add more features and grow this project and it always is nice to receive new ideas from players. Hope you enjoy this game and help me to make it grow.

Controls:
WASD - Movement (Mouse to shoot, Look around)
M - Map view
B - Open the build menu
E - Purchase base turrets when infront of desired turret

To be added:
The game will grow with new units and upgrades, this will give the game a more in depth strategy system to give different ways to play and defeat your enemy.
